name: Rey%C3%A9_Hollis
content:
Reyé Hollis was a human male sergeant in the special forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In 3 ABY, shortly after the construction of Echo Base on the ice planet Hoth, Hollis and the Jedi Luke Skywalker were trapped together in an ice cave near the base. Hollis was skeptical of Jedi usefulness and Force powers.
Reyé Hollis first appeared as an extra in the 1980 film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. He was first canonically identified in the 2022 short story "Luke on the Bright Side" by Sam Maggs, published in the anthology Stories of Jedi and Sith. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Hollis' last name was first given in the 1998 Star Wars Customizable Card Game set Special Edition Limited, and his first name was revealed in the Star Wars Insider 74 article "Who's Who in Echo Base" by Josh Radke, published on February 26, 2004.
